timeline.message: Improve warehouse assignment for multi warehouses

timeline.bodyText: It seems like we're converting to Vector3d in a lot of cases. Should we add a getVec3d to buildingworker?
timeline.author: Mekle001

replies.bodyText: Hmm, would be an overkill, since there is a new Vec3d(blockpos) constructor as well
replies.author: Raycoms
